org.apache.spark.util.logging

Class SizeBasedRollingPolicy

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.util.logging.SizeBasedRollingPolicy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Logging, RollingPolicy

    public class SizeBasedRollingPolicy
extends Object
implements RollingPolicy, Logging
    Defines a RollingPolicy by which files will be rolled over after reaching a particular size.
